RecipeDef.label: Build Colt M1911
RecipeDef.description: Builds an ancient pattern automatic pistol. Weak and short range, but quick.

RecipeDef.label: Build Nail Gun
RecipeDef.description: Your usual pneumatic nailgun.

RecipeDef.label: Build SIG Sauer P226
RecipeDef.description: The SIG Sauer P226 is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer. The SIG Sauer P226 and its variants are in service with numerous law enforcement and military organizations worldwide. Low damage, high rate of fire and good accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Lee-Enfield
RecipeDef.description: Builds an ancient bolt-action rifle. Good range, good power and low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Uzi
RecipeDef.description: The Uzi is a micro-submachine gun. Short range, low power and high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Spectre M4 Luger
RecipeDef.description: Builds a compact, wide-caliber slug-thrower. Very short range, but it packs a punch and handles quite well.

RecipeDef.label: Build Remington 870
RecipeDef.description: Builds an ancient shotgun for personal defence.

RecipeDef.label: Build M37A2 Pump Shotgun
RecipeDef.description: The M37A2 Pump Shotgun which also known as the M37A2 Combat Shotgun, is a pump-action combat shotgun manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems. The M37A2 is a simple and effective pump-action shotgun; its "classic" pump-action allows extremely powerful shells to be fired reliably. The M37A2 is employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and Weyland-Yutani PMCs.

RecipeDef.label: Build M24 Sniper Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds an ancient pattern military sniper rifle. Bolt action, long range, great accuracy and power.

RecipeDef.label: Build M42A Scope Rifle
RecipeDef.description: The M42A Scope Rifle is an American-made semi-automatic sniper rifle chambered for 10mm M252 HEAP ammunition. It is employed as the primary sniper weapon of the United States Colonial Marine Corps.

RecipeDef.label: Build SVU OTs-03 Dragunov
RecipeDef.description: The SVU OTs-03 Dragunov is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. High damage, long range and very good accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build L-15 LMG
RecipeDef.description: Builds the L-15 LMG for personal defense. As a portable light machine gun the L-15 is heavy to carry around but is capable of providing 15-round bursts for suppressing fire. Has a large magazine to accomodate the large burst fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build M56 Smart Gun
RecipeDef.description: The M56 Smart Gun is a portable heavy machine gun with automatic targeting capabilities chambered for 10x28mm caseless ammunition. It is notably employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps. It hurts like hell.

RecipeDef.label: Build XM214 Microgun
RecipeDef.description: Builds the XM214 Microgun, which is a multi-barrel machine gun with an extremely high rate of fire. The design of this weapon originates from Mechanoids.

RecipeDef.label: Build R2 Charge Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the R2 Charge Rifle, a charged-shot energy projectile rifle.

RecipeDef.label: Build M16 Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds a general-purpose military assault rifle for field or urban combat. Fires a 3-round burst.

RecipeDef.label: Build SIG SG553
RecipeDef.description: The SIG SG553, a slightly improved version of the SG552, is the SBR (Short Barrel Rifle) version of the SIG SG550. It fires the 5.56x45mm NATO round. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Steyr AUG A3
RecipeDef.description: The Steyr AUG A3 is an Austrian bullpup 5.56×45mm NATO assault rifle, designed in the 1960s by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH. Average damage, good range, good accuracy and low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build FN SCAR-H
RecipeDef.description: The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle (SCAR) is a gas-operated self-loading rifle with a rotating bolt. The rifle was developed by FN Herstal (FNH) for the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM) to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. Good damage, good range, good accuracy and low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build FAMAS G2
RecipeDef.description: The FAMAS is a bullpup-styled assault rifle designed and manufactured in France by MAS located in Saint-Étienne, which is now a member of the French government-owned Nexter group. It is the service rifle of the French military. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build RL T9 Burning Sun
RecipeDef.description: Builds the RL T9 Burning Sun, an incendiary bolt launcher that is capable of starting fires from a distance.

RecipeDef.label: Deconstruct personal shield
RecipeDef.description: Deconstructs a personal shield to retrieve some of the materials used to make it. Produces 30 steel bars and 2 integrated circuits.

RecipeDef.label: Build Remington M95 Derringer
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Remington M95 Derringer, a small decorated revolver. Accurate at short range only. Moderately damaging with a short aim and cooldown period.

RecipeDef.label: Build Sphinx AT 2000
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Sphinx AT 2000, a high quality and highly durable handgun that is used by elite forces and sport shooters. Great accuracy, moderate damage but a tad slow.

RecipeDef.label: Build Vektor CP1
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Vektor CP1, an ergonomical handgun with a drastically non-rectangular design. Good accuracy and low recoil, but weak with a slightly lower range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Para Ordnance P14-45
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Para Ordnance P14-45m which is a counterfeit ancient 45 ACP handgun with slightly improved internal mechanisms and a plastic frame. High accuracy and above average range, average fire rate and damage.

RecipeDef.label: Build TEC-9
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Tec-9 lightweight semi-automatic pistol with a quick draw, low damage and very high firerate. Operates at a short range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Silenced TMP
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Silenced TMP (tactical machine pistol). Somewhat accurate at long range, has fast burstfire but low stopping power.

RecipeDef.label: Build Beretta 93R
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Beretta 93R, a nice-looking machinepistol with a very fast burstfire mode. Low stopping power and hits up to pistol range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Mosin-Nagant M91
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Mosin-Nagant M91, an ancient bolt-action rifle. Good range, dood power and low rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Scorpion EVO 3
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Scorpion EVO 3, a machinepistol or light SMG with a notorious folding stock design. Fires weak ammunition in quick five shot-bursts at pistol range.

RecipeDef.label: Build M3 Greasegun
RecipeDef.description: Builds a M3 Greasegun, a very simplistic submachinegun design. Low damage, high fire rate and short range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Kriss Vector K10
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Kriss Vector K10, a submachinegun that fires in medium length bursts. Its substantially reduced knockback causes it to be accurate up to medium range, but its bullet drop limits maximum range by a lot.

RecipeDef.label: Build HK MP5A3
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Heckler Koch Machine Pistol 5A3, a 9mm submachine gun of German design. It was originally developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler Koch GmbH of Oberndorf am Neckar. Low damage and short range, very high rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build HK UMP45
RecipeDef.description: The HK UMP45 is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler Koch. The HK UMP45 has been adopted by various agencies such as the U.S. Customs and Border Protection. Heckler Koch developed the UMP45 as a successor to the MP5. Average damage, low range and high rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Striker Shotgun
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Striker Shotgun, a cheap-looking semi-automatic shotgun. Has a high fire rate and high damage output, but low range.

RecipeDef.label: Build M45 Tactical Shotgun
RecipeDef.description: Builds the M45 Tactical Shotgun, a shotgun used by the United Nations Space Command Army. Holds 8 shells with a quick fire rate but low range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Atchisson Assault AA-12
RecipeDef.description: Builds an Atchisson Assault AA-12, an automatic shotgun with almost no recoil. Has burst fire, is moderately accurate at just under rifle range and has high damage output.

RecipeDef.label: Build M90 CAWS
RecipeDef.description: Builds the M90 Close Assault Weapon System (M90 CAWS). It is the UNSC's primary shotgun and is one of the most effective close range infantry weapons used by front line forces.

RecipeDef.label: Build Walther WA 2000 Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Walther WA 2000 Rifle, a limited edition ancient sniper rifle. Great range, exceptional accuracy, very high damage and very low fire rate.

RecipeDef.label: Build HK XM8 Military Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the HK XM8 Military Rifle, an ancient pattern military weapon. Three-round burst. Good range, low power an high rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build AK-47
RecipeDef.description: Builds the AK-47, a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62×39mm assault rifle. It was first developed in the Soviet Union by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is officially known as Avtomat Kalashnikova (Russian: Автомат Калашникова). Good damage, average range and rate of fire but poor accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build MA5 ICWS
RecipeDef.description: Builds the MA5 Individual Combat Weapon System (MA5 ICWS or MA5 Assault rifle). It is a standard-issue service rifle of the UNSC Marines.

RecipeDef.label: Build Beretta CX4
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Beretta CX4, a highly reliable compact carbine. It is designed to fire pistol rounds up to rifle range. Below average damage, average fire rate, above average range and fires in two round burst.

RecipeDef.label: Build Ruger PC-9
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Ruger PC-9, a carbine sidearm with pistol-calibre. Its long barrel allows it to fire pistol bullets at rifle range. Average damage, above average fire rate and average range.

RecipeDef.label: Build HK USC
RecipeDef.description: Builds the HK USC, a stable semi-automatic pistol-calibre carbine with low kickback and an unusual stock design. Average damage, above average fire rate and range that fires three round bursts.

RecipeDef.label: Build AKS-74U
RecipeDef.description: Builds the AKS-74U short assault rifle (the "U" suffix means "Ukorochennyj" in Russian = "Shortened" in English). It was developed in the late 1970s from the AKS-74 assault rifle. The AKS-74U was intended as a personal defense weapon for tank, gun, helicopter and other vehicle crews as well as for special operation forces. The AKS-74U has the size and effective range of a typical submachine gun, but has advantage of assault rifle ammunition and magazines. Average damage and rate of fire, low range but poor accurracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build M4A1 Carbine
RecipeDef.description: Builds the M4 Carbine, a shorter and lighter variant of the M16A2 assault rifle. It is heavily used by the United States Armed Forces and is replacing the M16 rifle in most of the United States Army and United States Marine Corps combat units as the primary infantry weapon. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and good accurracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build RPK-74
RecipeDef.description: Builds the RPK-47, an ancient pattern military rifle. Fires an 8-round burst. Good range, low power and high rate of fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build MA39X ICWS
RecipeDef.description: Builds the MA39X Individual Combat Weapon System (MA39X ICWS or MA39X Assault Rifle), a close combat service rifle of the UNSC. Fires a 12-round burst with average medium range accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Barrett M82A1 SASR
RecipeDef.description: Builds the AM Barrett M82, a recoil-operated semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. It is used by many units and armies around the world. Despite its designation as an anti-materiel rifle, it is used by some armed forces as an anti-personnel sniper rifle. Very high damage, long range and very good accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build SRS99 AM Sniper Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Sniper Rifle System 99 Anti-Materiel, which is more formally known as the Special Applications Rifle. It is the favored sniper rifle of the United Nations Space Command. Has a very long range with high accuracy and stopping power.

RecipeDef.label: Build Armalite AR-50
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Armalite AR-50, which is a heavy, accurate, military-grade bolt-action rifle chambered for .50 calibre bullets. Its weight and muzzle brake significantly lowers recoil. Average fire rate, very high damage, high accuracy and long range.

RecipeDef.label: Build Micor Defense MD50
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Micor Defense MD50, an autoloading anti-materiel rifle with a compact bullpup design. This allows it to be operated and carried by a single person. It can be used to destroy structures. Low fire rate, high range, extremely high damage and high accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Ultima Ratio Hecate II
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Ultima Ratio Hecate II, a special application scoped rifle with a long muzzle brake and wooden stock. It is very heavy and will greatly slow any wielder's pace. It can be used to destroy walls. Low fire rate, high range, very high damage and high accuracy.

RecipeDef.label: Build Milkor MGL
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Milkor MGL (multiple grenade launcher), a launcher-type weapon that fires 40mm concussive grenades at a higher rate than a human could.

RecipeDef.label: Build RPG-7
RecipeDef.description: Builds the RPG-7 (rocket propelled grenade). It is a portable, shoulder-fired, unguided weapon that is capable of firing a deadly explosive from long range. The explosive has a wide blast radius. Slow to reload and slow to fire. It must be reloaded after every shot.

RecipeDef.label: Build M5 RPG
RecipeDef.description: Builds the M5 Rocket Propelled Grenade (RPG). It is a portable, shoulder-fired, reloadable, semi-automatic unguided anti-armor rocket-propelled grenade launcher used by United States Colonial Marine Corps as their standard issue RPG. Able to load up to 4 rockets, the M5 RPG is the favorite anti-infantry toy of the USCM.

RecipeDef.label: Build .44 Remington Magnum
RecipeDef.description: Builds the .44 Remington Magnum. It is based on a lengthened .44 Special Case, and it is calibrated to higher pressures for greater velocity (and thus, energy). Very lightweight and accurate at medium range.

RecipeDef.label: Build One-beam Laser Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the One-Beam Laser Rifle. It is a fantastic laser rifle with Mechanoid technology that fires 1 energy beam. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the beam can catch on fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Tri-beam Laser Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Tri-Beam Laser Rifle. It is a fantastic laser rifle with Mechanoid technology that fires 3 energy beams in succession. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the beam can catch on fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build Penta-beam laser rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Penta-Beam Laser Rifle. It is a fantastic laser rifle with Mechanoid technology that fires 5 energy beams in succession. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the beam can catch on fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build C3 Plasma Carbine
RecipeDef.description: Builds the C3 Plasma Carbine, a short range, light-weight plasma rifle. Fires a 3 round burst. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the plasma can catch on fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build C7 Multi-Plasma Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the C7 Multi-Plasma Rifle, a weapon with good stopping power and range. Fires a 7 round burst. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the plasma can catch on fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build C2 Plasma Precision Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds a C2 Plasma Precision Rifle. It is a highly accurate plasma sniper rifle with a low rate of fire. Fires a 2 round burst. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the beam can catch on fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build X-Zero Railgun
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Railgun X-Zero, an electrically-charged electro-magnetic projectile launcher. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the projectile can catch on fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build PTRD-41 Rifle
RecipeDef.description: Builds the PTRD-41 Rifle (Shortened from Russian, ProtivoTankovoye Ruzhyo Degtyaryova; "Degtyaryov Anti-Tank Rifle"), which is an anti-tank rifle with special armor piercing penetration rounds.

RecipeDef.label: Build M72 LAW
RecipeDef.description: Builds the M72 LAW, an anti-tank rocket launcher with a special armor-piercing penetration rocket.

RecipeDef.label: Build Desert Eagle .45 ACP
RecipeDef.description: Builds the Desert Eagle .45 ACP, a famous and deadly pistol. Very accurate, fast fire rate and lightweight to carry.

RecipeDef.label: Build VSS Thread Cutter
RecipeDef.description: Builds the VSS Thread Cutter, a special forces sniper rifle. Very accurate at long range, has a fast fire rate and a large magazine capacity.

RecipeDef.label: Build TAR-21
RecipeDef.description: Builds the TAR-21. This marine sturm rifle is the standard firearm for all combat personnel in the Colonial Marine Corps. Fires a 5 round burst.

RecipeDef.label: Build M249 SAW MG
RecipeDef.description: Builds the M249 SAW MG, a heavy machinegun. It has a 200 round magazine and fires in 20 round bursts. Not very accurate but good at providing suppressing fire.

RecipeDef.label: Build EMP Grenades
RecipeDef.description: Builds a set of EMP Grenades. Electro-Magnetic Pulse Grenades are extremely damaging to electronic equipment. These grenades are thrown by hand and have a 3 tile radius from the point of impact.

RecipeDef.label: Build Molotov Cocktail
RecipeDef.description: Make a thrown weapon that burns your enemies into ashes!

RecipeDef.label: Build Incendiary Grenade
RecipeDef.description: A condensed mix of plasma materials make for a small but chaos inducing explosion.

RecipeDef.label: Build Frag Grenade
RecipeDef.description: Old-school fragmentation grenades.

RecipeDef.label: Build Flashbang Grenades
RecipeDef.description: Builds a set of Shock Grenades. Shock grenades are damaging to electronic equipment or electronic-based entities. They do not harm non-electronic entities. Shock Grenades are thrown by hand and have a 3x3 blast zone around the point of impact.

RecipeDef.label: Build Fusion Grenades
RecipeDef.description: An improvement over the simple frag grenade, contains a more potent explosive. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Build Plasma Grenades
RecipeDef.description: A very potent mix of plasma particles make for a small but deadly explosion. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Build Fire Extinguisher
RecipeDef.description: A gun loaded with expanding foam. It can be used to extinguish fires. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Build Melee Shocker
RecipeDef.description: Builds a Melee Shocker. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Short Bow
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Short Bow. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Pila
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a set of Pila. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Great Bow
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Great Bow. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Scorpion Crossbow
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Scorpion Crossbow. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Balestra
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Balestra. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Crossbow
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Crossbow. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Recurve Bow
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Recurve Bow. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Scythian Bow
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Scythian Bow. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Spear
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Spear. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Mace
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Mace. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Craft Club
RecipeDef.description: Crafts a Club. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Norbal Sword
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Norbal Sword. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Heroic Sword
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Heroic Sword. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Norbal War Axe
RecipeDef.description: Smithts a Norbal War Axe. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Battleaxe
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Battleaxe. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Dagger
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Dagger. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Gladius
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Gladius. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Longsword
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Longsword. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Scimitar
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Scimitar. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Glaive
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Glaive. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Partisan
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Partisan. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Knife
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Knife. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Bonesaw
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Bonesaw. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Machete
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Machete. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Monkey Wrench
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Monkey Wrench. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Сleaver
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Сleaver. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Shiv
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Shiv. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Tanto
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Tanto. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Katana
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Katana. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Tsurugi
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Tsurugi. Produces 1.

RecipeDef.label: Smith Sledgehammer
RecipeDef.description: Smiths a Sledgehammer. Produces 1.
